au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=6m_L2=1.3m_offset
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(500,300) # Drive guide to g6 driveGuide(guideConfig.g6) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g6) driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive beamstops up selBs(3)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(46.0, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(46.0, 0) driveBsz(258.0)
